subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Me not hear correct.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I don't spend all that much time listening at home, mostly it's building 
boards. I think that's just my part of the work.  The time I set aside for 
listening? Sitting in the bathroom! Maybe that's why I pick up voices in 
other weird spots.

I was AAEVP's site earlier today, they seem to have some interesting 
projects going, it might be worth re-joining.

Frank
